DOC.brief_summary: Title study : Optimizing Fluid Status Study code : HD-IIT-01-E Study design : Prospective open design study centre two location Applied medical device : Body Composition Monitor ( BCM ) determination fluid overload dry weight Aim study : To improve fluid status chronic HD patient ( measure OH ( overhydration ) TAFO ( time average fluid overload ) ) base BCM measurement . Up , BCM occasionally apply location study centre . Study hypothesis : Regular measurement fluid status ( assess BCM ) display dry weight ( post-weight plan ) significant consequence , namely decrease : - time average fluid overload ( TAFO ) , - proportion patient severe overhydration OH > 2.5 L , OH/ECW > 15 % ) - proportion dehydrate patient ( OH < -1.0 L , OH < -7 % ) , - mean overhydration , - variance overhydration , - time outside reference range ( -1.0L < OH < 2.5L ) . Devices use study : Dialysis machine 5008 equip Blood Pressure Monitor BPM , Blood Volume Monitor BVM , Blood Temperature Monitor BTM , Online Clearance Monitor OCM ; Body Composition Monitor BCM ; Data management software / database system NephroLink Disposables use study : BVM blood line BCM electrodes Patients : 60 patient
